name: npm-task-watcher
description: Compiles scss (./style.css), js (./main.min.js). `npm watch` to compile when files change. `npm run build` to build files once, `npm start` to watch file changes and refresh browser. Minifies and auto-prefixes.

scripts.css: npm run css:sass1 && npm run css:postcss
scripts.build: npm run js & npm run css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.start: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run bs

author: Geoff Yuen
